meanings.definition: A list of goods sent or services provided, with a statement of the sum due for these.
meanings.sent1: The invoice showed the cost of the items purchased.
meanings.sent2: She received an invoice for the services rendered.
meanings.sent3: The invoice for the party balloons made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His face turned red when he saw the invoice for the damages.
meanings.sent5: The invoice was as clear as a sunny day in summer.

meanings.definition: To send an invoice to; bill.
meanings.sent1: He will invoice the client for the completed project.
meanings.sent2: Remember to invoice the customer after delivering the goods.
meanings.sent3: She joked that she would invoice her friend for the favor.
meanings.sent4: The company decided to invoice for the extra services provided.
meanings.sent5: The decision to invoice early proved to be beneficial.
